text: The 2014–15 Cyprus Basketball Division A was the 48th season of the Cyprus Basketball Division A, the top-tier level professional basketball league on Cyprus. The season started on November 1, 2014, and ended April 21, 2015.Schedule - Eurobasket.com AEK Larnaca won the national championship. ==Regular season== === Rounds 1-12 === === Rounds 13-18 === ==Playoffs== ==References== Cyprus Basketball Basketball Category:Cyprus Basketball Division 1
title: 2014–15 Cyprus Basketball Division A
